summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the licensing and regulation of peddlers and solicitors; amending Sections 190, 192, 193, 194, 197 and 197-1 of the License Code (Ordinance 48022), adding new sections designated Sections 192-1, 194-1, 194-2, 194-3, 194-4, and 194-5 thereto, and repealing Sections 191-1 and 195 thereof.
